text: Santiago Damián García Correa (14 September 1990 – 4 February 2021), nicknamed Morro, was a Uruguayan professional footballer. He played as a striker. His last club was Argentine club Godoy Cruz, which tenure is thought to be the most successful of his professional career.La carrera del Morro García on Mendoza Post, 6 Feb 2021 García was a member of the Uruguay under-20 team that participated in the 2009 FIFA U-20 World Cup, where he played three games and scored one goal. On 6 February 2021, García was found dead in his apartment in Mendoza, Argentina, with a gunshot wound in the head, aged 30.Urgente: encontraron muerto a Santiago "Morro" García It was confirmed that the cause of death was suicide by gunshot. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Footballers from Montevideo Category:Suicides by firearm
title: Santiago García (Uruguayan footballer)
